title: [The Rift, Scatter]
description: A white-washed baby's crib stands alone in a circle of dark stones.  Snow swirls around the bed in a loose vortex.  The tortured cries and wails of an infant can be heard clearly, though there is no child to be found anywhere.

A white-washed baby's crib stands alone in a circle of glowing coals, illuminated with a reddish hue against the darkness.  The tortured cries and wails of an infant can be heard clearly, though there is no child to be found anywhere.
